frozen_definition.name: MiniMind
frozen_definition.signal_source: Productivity app complaints of 'overwhelmed and burned out', users prefer 'keeping things simple and doing the work'
frozen_definition.description: Ultra-simple daily task manager with just 3 slots per day, designed to reduce overwhelm and increase completion rates
frozen_definition.target_user: People overwhelmed by complex productivity systems who want to accomplish meaningful daily progress without tool complexity
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users report complex apps lead to 'less work getting done and more pointless maintenance'
core_loop: Choose maximum 3 important tasks for today
frozen_definition.differentiation: Artificial constraint of 3 tasks vs. unlimited lists, focus on completion psychology vs. feature richness
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes weekly reflections, habit tracking integration, and motivational content

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for basic 3-task functionality, premium for insights and motivation
